content.event: Azure Serverless Saturday
content.description: This event will introduce you to the Azure Serverless components such as Azure Functions, Azure Storage, Azure Cosmos DB, Event Grid, Service Bus, Logic Apps, API Management, and more concepts.

content.event: Patterns and Practices for Building Resilient AWS Serverless Applications
content.description: Yan Cui will look at a number of practices and architectural patterns that can help you build more resilient serverless applications. Such as multi-region, active-active, employing DLQs.

content.event: From Development to Production: Many Uses of Serverless Observability
content.description: Let's discuss about how to bring observability in the serverless applications! I am glad to be inviting Emrah Samdan from Thundra.io who'll be giving insights on Serverless monitoring.

content.event: Meet The Expert Online Series: Cloud
content.description: In this talk Guillaume Blaquiere will be comparing infrastructure and managed / serverless solutions from the practice side and about some wrong idea that new developers have about the serverless.

content.event: Serverless azure API functions using container services
content.description: Building a serverless azure function with .net core.

content.event: AWS Serverless: Casi d'uso reali
content.description: Il 25 Maggio 2020, dalle ore 18:30 alle ore 20:30, AWS User Group Bari e Antonio Giordano - AWS Certified Solutions Architect, vi invitano all'evento "AWS Serverless: Casi d'uso reali".

content.event: Networking for Azure Functions – it’s for Serverless devs too!
content.description: Thiago Almeida, founder of ACSUG, ex-MVP and Microsoft Architect and Michael Collier, Principal Software Development Engineer, will discuss approaches for private site access.

content.event: Good Morning Serverless - Luca Bianchi
content.description: Tom McLaughlin interviews Neosperience CTO Luca Bianchi

content.event: Do more with less code in a serverless world
content.description: There are many software engineering practices that can and should be applied to Lambda functions: Single Responsibility Principle, You Ain't Gonna Need It, Keep It Simply Stupid.

content.event: Why Serverless still needs protection
content.description: In this presentation, Ron Harnik will discuss the most critical challenges related to securing serverless applications - from development to deployment.

content.event: Event Driven Architectures and Security
content.description: Marek Kuczynski and Uri Segev will introduce event-driven architecture before doing a deep dive on serverless security.

content.event: AWS Summer Camp - Serverless - End to End Observability
content.description: The AWS Summer Camp continues online on May 26th @ 6pm GMT with a great Serverless talk by Danilo Poccia, AWS Chief Evangelist (EMEA).

content.event: Nordic Serverless - Alexa, who's ringing my doorbell?
content.description: Join us for a meetup where Goran Vuksic and Gunnar Grosch will build a serverless Alexa skill with facial recognition using an IoT device and AWS services.

content.event: AWS User Group UK Meetup #42
content.description: Serverless Deployments with Canary (Nicole Yip from Lego) Servers are dead! How architecture in the 2020s is being revolutionised by serverless (Matthew Clark)

content.event: Good Morning Serverless - Paul Chin Jr.
content.description: Tom McLaughlin interviews DevRel at http://begin.com Paul Chin Jr.

content.event: AWS Serverless-First Function - Serverless for your Application
content.description: Consider this event your complete builder’s guide to serverless applications.

content.event: Modernizing applications with serverless: Scale higher, ship faster, and reduce TCO up to 90%
content.description: Join us for an AWS webinar, with partner Stackery, to learn why companies are choosing to modernize their Windows-based applications.

content.event: Dublin GCS Connect: Serverless
content.description: An overview of how serverless fits into the current enterprise technology landscape  & the cloud migration of a legacy eCommerce application. Speakers from IBM & The LEGO Group.

content.event: Good Morning Serverless - Rob Sutter
content.description: Tom McLaughlin interviews AWS Developer Advocate Rob Sutter

content.event: ServerlessDays Italy
content.description: ServerlessDays Italy è una conferenza sulle tecnologie serverless dedicata agli sviluppatori.

content.event: Good Morning Serverless - Danielle Heberling
content.description: Tom McLaughlin interviews Stackery developer Danielle Heberling

content.event: Build a Serverless Web App for a Theme Park - Launching the Serverless Web Application
content.description: Learn how to build a complete serverless web application for a popular theme park called Innovator Island. In this series, you'll get hands-on experience building a scalable serverless application.

content.event: Build a Serverless Web App for a Theme Park - Real-Time Messaging with Serverless Web Applications
content.description: Learn how to build a complete serverless web application for a popular theme park called Innovator Island. In this series, you'll get hands-on experience building a scalable serverless application.

content.event: State of Serverless in 2020
content.description: It has been more than five years since serverless became part of our application development life cycle, following the announcement of AWS Lambda.  Let's talk about how it looks like now.

content.event: AWS Virtual Amplify Days
content.description: Register for our two-day exploration of full stack cloud development. On Day 1, we'll hear stories from Amplify users who will cover key features and how they integrated them into their applications.

content.event: Build a Serverless Web App for a Theme Park - On-Ride Serverless Photo Processing
content.description: Learn how to build a complete serverless web application for a popular theme park called Innovator Island. In this series, you'll get hands-on experience building a scalable serverless application.

content.event: Build a Serverless Web App for a Theme Park - Park Statistics and Business Insights
content.description: Learn how to build a complete serverless web application for a popular theme park called Innovator Island. In this series, you'll get hands-on experience building a scalable serverless application.

content.event: AWS Virtual Amplify Days
content.description: Register for our two-day exploration of full stack cloud development. On Day 2, we'll continue with our keynote customer story from Orange Theory Fitness which is focused on video.

content.event: Build a Serverless Web App for a Theme Park - Developing an Event-Driven Architecture
content.description: Learn how to build a complete serverless web application for a popular theme park called Innovator Island. In this series, you'll get hands-on experience building a scalable serverless application.

content.event: ServerlessDays Hamburg
content.description: ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.
